AddOn.Name: Kedama
AddOn.Notes: Player-enabled Kedama carried over from the Lunatic version. Modified Tackle to become Assist Attack. Adjusted spirit costs to player-equivalents with slight nerfs.

AddOn.Name: Evil Eye
AddOn.Notes: Player-enabled Evil Eye carried over from the Lunatic version. Modified Mega Parteyecle Cannon to become Assist Attack. Adjusted spirit costs to player-equivalents with slight nerfs.

AddOn.Name: Makai Insect
AddOn.Notes: Player-enabled Makai Insect carried over from the Lunatic version. Modified Predation to become Assist Attack. Adjusted spirit costs to player-equivalents with slight nerfs. Guard will still be too good.

AddOn.Name: Kappa
AddOn.Notes: Player-enabled Kappa carried over from the Lunatic version. Modified Monster Cucumber to become Assist Attack. Adjusted spirit costs to player-equivalents with slight nerfs.
